name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MO - To The Moon! Mouse Odometer

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MO - To the Moon, Mouse Odometer is a fun and interactive Chrome extension that tracks the distance you move your mouse in Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Join the scrolling adventure with MO - To the Moon, Mouse Odometer! Track the distance you scroll with your mouse while enjoying exciting milestones, humorous jokes, and fascinating facts. Install this engaging Chrome extension now and let your scrolling take you to new heights!

Notice: Use Your Computer and Mouse Appropriately.

THIS EXTENSION IS PROVIDED JUST FOR FUN!

Remember to use your computer and mouse responsibly to avoid repetitive strain. Take regular breaks, maintain proper posture, consider ergonomic equipment, adjust mouse sensitivity, and practice wrist and hand exercises.

Key Features:
- Track mouse scrolling distance in pixels, meters, feet, and miles
- Discover thrilling milestones at famous landmarks and iconic locations
- Enjoy hilarious jokes related to your scrolling achievements
- Learn fascinating facts along the way

Install MO - To the Moon, Mouse Odometer and let your scrolling journey begin. Reach for the stars, conquer virtual distances, and enjoy the fun-filled adventure as your mouse takes you to the Moon!

Please Note: This Extension Tracks the Mouse Distance Only in Chrome!
